product_desc: Victoria Falls Activities Center is a leading Tour Company in Victoria Falls. Experience a bird’s eye view of the magnificent Victoria Falls.Whether you’re off for a romantic holiday, family trip, or an all-inclusive holiday, Victoria Falls holiday packages on our website are well planned, simple and affordable. Find the perfect holiday package for Victoria Falls on our website or call us on +263 1328 43001

name: Chatsipac Enterprises P/L
product_desc:
Australian based Zimbabweans Growing Medical Marijuana in Zimbabwe with future aspiration of setting up a Medical research program in collaboration with the University of Zimbabwe. 700 ha of land available-on a 99 year lease from the government of Zimbabwe.

Chatsipac has just been successful in lobbying Government to legalise the Growing of Medical Marijuana now seeks to raise Au $150 000 for Licensing and start-up.

name: ZimCulture
product_desc: I created a site (www.zimculture.com) to help share the knowledge of our culture, traditions and the strength of our languages. I created it because most of the people my age do not know much about our country and its background, culture and its languages especially Shona is becoming forgotten and most of the words are now being translated on google translate using wrong translations such as the translation of the word bottle. It would be important for us to share the knowledge and the existence of such literatures that address the history of our country and its traditions and if enough words are posted I would be able to create a free and readily available dictionary.
high_concept: Kings and Queens anchored by our cultural integrity

name: Leaph
product_desc: Leaph is an academic management system utitlizing the best of both Data Science and Machine Learning to help them get the most out of their development. By using data provided by schools, universites and individual tutors, we can help keep track of a students performance and pick out flaws or gaps in their educational background to help leaders of academia better correct and mentor their students. We use Machine Learning to help schools predict overall performance based on the previous academic records. Using neural networks we can pin point exactly where a student may have missed something and predict what results this lack may cause, by cross referencing the subject topics with question frequency in final exam papers. This allows teachers to aid slower students more efficiently without slowing down the progress of their classes.
high_concept: School management system powered by data science.
markets: Data Mining, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning

name: Law Portal Zimbabwe
product_desc:
This is a platform that seeks to converge the legal minds, primarily of Zimbabwe, with room to expand to other jurisdictions, onto one platform in order to assist lawyers, students and the general populace access to legal knowledge.

First world legal research material is either expensive or not readily accessible and this is evident by the frequent and well appreciated donations from embassies of such material to our superior courts for use in handing down judgments in our courts of law..

The platform seeks to utilize the resultant judgments based on first world research material and make them accessible to students, less privileged lawyers and the general populace. The objective being that ultimately pleadings made before our courts are based, in addition to currently available local material, on first world knowledge.

We are of the opinion that this will develop our law and raise our judicial standards to international levels.

name: Med Awa International
product_desc: Prosthetics & orthotics, mobility- these for amputees, people without limbs, injured, or any other physical challenges.

name: Kudzai Construction Company
product_desc: Kudzai Construction Company, a  proposed heavy duty Construction company providing road construction and road rehabilitation services to Zimbabwe and the SADC region in Africa. With the business boom that is occurring in our local area and the desire to improve overall profit margins,  the company's goal is to become the Best HEAVYDUTY construction company in Africa. The primary plan is to capitalise on China and Zimbabwes longstanding relationship as the company seeks out investors inorder to acquire heavy duty Construction equipment for operation.

name: Diner 9
product_desc: Chips, burgers, hot dogs, fries.

name: ImotaCars
product_desc:
ImotaCars is a new ride hailing launching in Zimbabwe this year. ImotaCars will allow taxi companies across the country to sign their fleets up and access customers through on-demand requests wherever their drivers are, Allowing them to generate revenue 24/7, increase their businesses and grow their companies.

ImotaCars also promotes safety to all its customers by recording every journey for every customer live on the backend dashboard from the moment they request the ride to the moment they rate their trip at the end. All in an effort to ensure our customers using the ImotaCars app (android/iOS) reach their destination and pay a price that is fair and un-manipulated.

Being one of the first ride hailing apps in the country, it will also usher in a new mode of safe, convenient and cost effective transport to all, whether you’re late for a meeting, on your way home from a night out or just want a lift from the airport to your destination.

name: Patsimeredu Edutainment Trust
product_desc: Y-en-gage, is a mobile application that interacts with young people on sexual and reproductive health issues affecting the young people. It provides a gamified platform that allows young people to post questions and get answers, interact with each other,  as well as referral to health and legal services. It awards the participants with redeemable points  giving the young people an opportunity to be hosted on the Patsimeredu Edutainment Trust TV show as a special guest, as well as other benefits. The product is targeted at young people between the ages of  14-25 who are part of Patsimeredu Edutainment Trust's programming the Buddies for love project, which entails education of young people on sexual and reproductive health and life skills issues through the use of theatre, television and radio programs to promote leadership, responsibility and healthy lives..

name: Educational Documentary Services Trust
product_desc:
StudyBox is a Learning Management Server which makes digital multimedia learning resources accessible to off-grid, offline users. Through the StudyBox we make curriculum-based multimedia educational resources available to students in rural and peri-urban areas; who do not have access to textbooks and conventional educational resources.
The StudyBox is a low-cost device which costs less than a laptop, and whose cost implication to students per subject that they are studying is a quarter of the cost of purchasing a textbook.
StudyBox units run off mains electricity, power banks or solar systems, making them idea for both on-grid and off-grid use. Internet connectivity is not required to access the resources on StudyBox units but when connected to the internet, users of StudyBox units can participate in webinars and other interactive activities.

name: Shermax Group
product_desc:
Edu Helper links tutor and students and allows the to do online lessons or meet in real life. It has a disruptive model that relates to its family of products. This is an employment model and physical financial reward incentive with a retail store.

It has a personal feel to it and converges the online and traditional methods of cheating. It is obligation free and has huge social responsibility an communication benefits on every level.

product_desc: ABC is a school management system which provides a common platform for all stakeholders and aims to bring the much-needed simplicity in the administration of schools. Its sole purpose is enabling flexibility and scalability for every user to realize their potential and achieve overall development for the students.
high_concept: All­-in­-one low cost College and School Management System,

product_desc:
The Commonground Network looks to draw on various tools to reach our end goal, of facilitating a better connected African student community. 

Our Android application will be released in March 2017 and allows students to add connections, create a profile of their interests, make posts, engage in conversation and search for other students by their profile, university and/or area of study.
high_concept: Connecting African Students to share ideas, opportunities and information

name: KUSIKA Design Centre
product_desc: KUSIKA is a design home in the midst of poverty, a social enterprise whose mission is to equip design hands with the tools necessary to design quality crafted goods and fuel trade. A creative community house which links more women and men to trade opportunities worldwide. "Every single person has a dream, not everyone has access to banks, internet and opportunities to be inspired and supported in achieving them. Currently majority of the women and men we work with, work from home with very limited access to facilities they require to thrive. We believe in the power of design, with the right tools, knowledge and market opportunities, design talent can change hopeless situations for the better". The customer is you and me, we love to be surrounded by beautifully crafted handmade products with an amazing story of design influence. The beneficiary is the women and men who come to our space to learn to design and use their talent to bring them income.
markets: Small and Medium Businesses, Product Design, Training, Fair Trade
company_type: Incubator, Design Studio, Manufacturing, Culture & Lifestyle

name: FundoLinker
product_desc:
FundoLinker is a Zimbabwean startup that is aimed at bringing education providers and education seekers together.

We realized that schools, colleges, tutors, teachers and trainers were not taking advantage of every piece of information they had to attract and retain more students. On the other hand parents, guardians and students were not getting the much needed information from  schools, colleges, tutors, teachers and trainers. 

As a result schools, colleges, tutors, teachers and trainers were struggling to attract and retain the right students. Conversely parents, guardians and students were finding it extremely difficult to find the right school, college, tutor, teacher or trainer.

FundoLinker helps address these challenges by providing an education provider platform that can bring education providers and education seekers together and allow them to interact in a way that brings mutual benefits to both sides.

name: Tenga-Thengisa
product_desc:
Tenga-Thengisa is an online marketing platform that advertises and provides a buy and sell market place, student off campus accommodation, student blog and university news.  Tenga-Thengisa is committed to making student life convenient by making everything available on a one stop website.

The name Tenga-Thengisa was derived from two of the main languages in Zimbabwe, Tenga (Shona- to buy) and Thengisa (Ndebele – to sell). The website, www.tenga-thengisa.co.zw , was officially launched on the 1st of January 2016.

name: Creative Young Minds Lab
product_desc:
Pyrolysis
This is a process by which waste plastic and tyres are reduced  under high heat and high pressure in the absence of oxygen to produce diesel.
Diesel is a fuel of economic importance as it is used to power much of the large machinery especially in developing countries
This process enables us to get 45%-90% of diesl from a specific tonnage of plastics or tyres.

name: Trampec
product_desc:
TRAMPEC Pvt Ltd has seven areas of businesses it wants to
exploit in Zimbabwe. The company has secured a deal with one of the
biggest dairy companies in Zimbabwe to supply 2 million
litres of milk a year. The project would need $800 000 to
have a medium dairy business and would create full time
employment for 4 people. The dairy would take 200 cows or
more and to be in Murehwa. We need to supply 1 million litres of milk in the first year. Zimbabwe suffers these shortages because most of the investment is from outsiders and once the political environment is unfavourable they sort for other countries. I am inviting you investors to help me create employment in the country where I would fight to survive through thick and thin. Why, because I have my country at heart and will always endeavour to help our brothers and sisters right
through our life time. 
I intend to establish dairy farms right through the country and manufacturing own dairy and meat products in the near future.

Crowd Based Services

Credit Based Crowd Funding for business that need funding needs that are short term in nature, typically companies that opt for this facility will issue a secured bond via CrowdFund

Equity Based Crowd Funding for businesses that have funding needs that are long term in nature.

Crowd sourcing -Crowd sourcing is done on the CrowdFund social networking platform

name: e-sikolo
product_desc:
e-sikolo is a portal where students at any level learn mathematics in an interactive way. The niche market are pupils in primary,  secondary and high schools, also including learners who do not attend any formal school. 
e-sikolo gives pupils daily mathematics exercises to practice the subject in a way that suits the syllabus requirements of their school curriculum. 
e-sikolo also provides an interface where real time sessions are exploited to provide one-one lessons with a live professional teacher. Through such sessions, online classrooms are also made available for pupils to interact with each other.
For students practicing for their final examinations, our platform emulates the real exam they intend to sit for, marks and gives specific recommendations for the pupil to focus on.

name: Speski
product_desc:
Why waste time on endless clicks or running around town searching for where to buy when you can easily find all the important details like directions, shopping hours, product prices, ingredients, user reviews, comparisons, videos and more on your mobile in one place.

Speski tracks current shopper location and then displays the nearest bank, bar, gas station, hotel, movie theatre, restaurant, supermarket, butchery and many more.

We have developed a unique marketplace that allows consumers to know their bills before they even visit a restaurant or supermarket. Shoppers use our platform as a first contact point for finding businesses or products near them. Business owners that provide the required information including prices on their online stores listed on Speski can increase sales both online and in store.

name: WTB!
product_desc:
Everyone has a birthday – our mission is to get people to use theirs to make their neighbourhood or city, and by extension the world, a better place. 

WTB! will be ignited by an engaging technological presence that facilitates interactivity. Individuals will pledge their birthday and receive suggestions for actions, or they can decide for themselves how they want to give back. They’ll take a selfie and write a story about their birthday gift, and share this on social media, tagging WTB! We will use this to generate a content stream of inspiring, feel good stories which brings more people into the movement.

WTB! will work with companies, to bring more employees into volunteering; with schools to promote community engagement with students; and with charities and NGOs to bring more people into their activities. This engagement would have added benefits for the NGOs - research demonstrates that people who volunteer with an organisation are more likely to also donate to that organisation.

product_desc: ilolly let's zimbabweans earn money online by submitting content suuch as pictures, videos,articles and music. This is how it works. A user subscribes for only $2 for the first month and is granted 3 submission chances of which he / she will use to submit content.if the customer chooses to submit a picture for a competition he/she will have to invite people to vote for her picture against other contenstants of which will win $5 every Friday. if customer chooses to submit a video, he/she will send a link to the youtube video and we upload it on our site. the customer then inited people to like it and gets rewarded $10 for every 10000 likes.However if user decides to submit an article, we will publish it and if user is paid $3 per 120 likes. Musicians can request features for free on the site, sale/buy beats, enter competition of which they have to get high votes to earn $20 and a free month of promotion on the site. More information is described at the site's TERMS AND CONDITIONS .

name: VasBox
product_desc:
VasBox is an android and web based stocktaking app designed primarily to manage inventories. The majority of micro-enterprises in the developing countries are traders who basically buy and sell commodities.
 
Our app provides a simple way for daily or any periodical stock counts and for the recording of daily purchases and sales as inventory management is the cornerstone of most micro-entrepreneurs’ businesses. 

Our solution therefore provides an easy way to manage inventories, analyse profitability for individual inventory line items, manage reorder levels and track daily cash receipt. The VasBox app is much more than just a stock taking app as it also provides reports and analysis to assist the entrepreneur with basic business decisions such as:

a.	Identifying the fast moving goods
b.	Identifying line items are the most profitable
c.	Preparing a basic profit and loss statement that can be presented to a bank
d.	Providing a basis for forecasts that can be presented to a bank
markets: Business Intelligence, Small and Medium Businesses, Micro-Enterprises, Fin Tech

product_desc: Around the world, more than 100m children living in urban slums do not have access to quality early childhood education. 60% of them are in Sub-Saharan Africa. Simba Education is a social enterprise that aims to build a sustainable and scalable solution. By leveraging the potential of mobile technology, we are putting an experienced educator in every caregiver's pocket. It allows us to create access to a quality and affordable education for children who cannot afford to pay for private day-care in Sub-Saharan Africa.

name: The Harare Times
product_desc:
This is a story of the future of Africa. When you mention the word New York in the streets of Harare or Johannesburg, the first thing that comes to mind is the legendary New York Times newspaper. Africa is brewing its own web-based Harare Times news website modeled around the Great New York Times .

For centuries Africa has been the troubled baby of the world, it suffered the most during the slave trade years, 53 out of 54 countries in Africa were once colonies and it is currently suffering repressive regimes and dictatorships. Civilization is still at a primitive stage, economic growth is moving at a snails pace and human rights abuses are the order of the day.

For such a continent, what can be better than having a news broadcaster that tells it like it is, with speed, accuracy and boldness. The Harare Times is fast becoming such a broadcaster. The Harare Times is more than just a news website, it is a revolution that is about to shock and shake Africa
high_concept: The New York Times of Africa
markets: Digital Media, East Africa, South Africa

africabookings.com is a UK incorporated company solely focused on hotel/lodge distribution across Africa.

We distribute our clients inventory to multiple distribution channels, including OTAs, and other hotel wholesalers.

This is a US$ 14 billion market and we earn transaction fees as well as supply lite PMS (Property Management System) technologies on a subscription model.

We currently have 500 properties listed across 10 sub-Saharan African countries signed up during our Proof of Concept stage and now target aggressively scaling across Africa.

We have staff in place across the continent. Our Goal is to become the largest re-seller of African hotel and lodge accommodation globally.

name: Crypto Counter
product_desc:
Our Smart ATM has the following features:
- Removable Accessories
- Install apps from our App Store
- Connect to and manage your device from the cloud (Cloud Connect)
- Built-in Bitcoin Support

Removable Accessories
Examples of accessories are the battery pack, the cash dispenser & the cash acceptor. These are removable - making it easy to upgrade the ATM and/or extend it's functionality

App Store
The CryptoCounter is designed to be a platform you can build on. You have complete control over what software and/or hardware goes in it

Cloud Connect
The Crypto Counter is designed to allow you to manage it from the Cloud. You can set you preferences, see your dashboard of statistics and/or monitor your bitcoin float from anywhere in the world

Bitcoin Support
Right out of the box, the CryptoCounter allows you to exchange bitcoin for fiat and vice versa. It also comes with an API that allows 3rd party developers to build Bitcoin apps. It's also built to support multiple crypto currencies
high_concept: A Smart ATM, Next Generation ATM

name: TV YANGU
product_desc: TV Yangu is an open platform for local creators to publish videos. The platform curates and showcases local content in terms of TV productions/programs, documentaries, movies from all over Africa as well as music videos.
high_concept: Telling Africa's best stories through videos

name: room8
product_desc: Room8 is an online platform that enables students in tertiary institutions to look for accommodation and also choose their roommates from the comfort of their homes. The platform also offers an advertising forum for landlords and enables tenants(students) to review the places where they are staying.

name: zim:tix
product_desc:
ZimTix is the first website established to provide online tickets in Zimbabwe. Events and tickets can be published through the ZimTix network to increase outreach and knowledge of the events. 

The website allows event organizers to provide tickets to attend events throughout the country. By taking advantage of the ZimTix network organizers can enhance their marketing outreach at a reduced cost.

name: Paywallet
product_desc: PayWallet is a mobile app that contains users ledger balances. People can exchange money, by completing a user authorized double entry. When bob sales to Sara goods worth $25, Bob's balance goes up by 25, and Sara's balance goes down by 25. PayWallet app displays all the services that the merchants will be offering and it lets you create a receipt for the goods that you want to buy. The user simply goes into a supermarket and takes the goods that they have made payment for to the till operator who will confirm the acceptance of PayWallet e-money. With this convenient application, users will not have to wait in line for the till operator to punch his/her till to check that the goods have been sold.
markets: Android, Young Adults, Elderly, Working Professionals

name: Off The Hook Group
product_desc:
Off The Hook Group is an organization headquartered in Zimbabwe with various operations in other countries such as South Africa. Off the hook is an organisation with interests in Human Resources development, Charity and Emancipation programmes, Education and Empowerment, Publishing and other areas of commerce.

Established in 2009, the group comprises of Off The Hook Network, a non profit making charity organisation, Off The Hook Leadership and Development Institute, Off The Hook Leadership and Management consultancy, Off The Hook Publishers and a counselling, rehabilitation company, Off The Hook Solutions.

By this any student get all knowledge about any Educational field from starting to being a professional or expert of that field.

name: Adsnile Technology
product_desc: Adsnile Technology is a Zimbabwean Company that focuses on Digital Advertising with a Classifieds website already launched ( www.adsnile.com ) ,we are planning on Launching a Satellite Television Channel (SPLASH TV) that is going to be accessed on all Free To Air Decoders around Sub Saharan Africa countries.We strongly believe that the two is a great combination given that we will be offering cheap advertising space on our Television channel and most of our Promotions and Programming will be available on our Classifieds Website to increase our RPM(Rate Per Millenium) plus quality Programming from African Producers. Adsnile Technology takes the pleasure to challenge Pay Television Networks that charges high cost for limited channels with the First Free To Air Television channel with a stable programming for everyone.
high_concept: Invest in a Sub Saharan Afica Satellite Television Channel

name: Cloudberry
product_desc:
Cloudberry is a marketing strategy like no other in Zimbabwe that seeks to maximize a business’s customer base and at the same time giving real value to the merchants & customers. 

Cloudberry offers merchant a platform on which to advertise themselves, sell their services products but having Cloudberry do the work. For a merchant to market their product or service they have to offer prospective clients a discounts, promotions if they are to use the service/product

Cloudberry attracts new customers through it huge mobile subscribers database(420 000subscribers) and also helps in maintaining the existing client base as along the merchant provides quality services.

The platform is intergrated with  Zimbabwe's biggest mobile payment platform Ecocash and all other payment gateways.

The customers are the general population who are seeking for discounted, high quality products& services.

name: VirtualBank Africa
product_desc: VirtualBank Africa is working to allow people without bank accounts to make online payments. We will achieve this by leveraging the mobile money infrastructure which is now very popular there. VirtualBank Africa will also use the same technique to make it safer and cheaper to send remittances to people without bank accounts.
high_concept: Making it possible for the unbanked to make online payments and receive remittances.

name: "B"
product_desc: An android and iOS app for kids in school. The app features a panic button that sends out a geo-tagged "bully alert" to teachers, friends and parents for help.
